name: Lumina (Nickradford)
description:
Thanks for checking out Lumina!

Lumina is still in active development, so please be gentle!

Lumina is my first venture into game development. I've been lurking on the Unity Subreddit and following Brackeys, Quill18 and other creators for some time, and am really excited to work on something.

Lumina is a minimalist platform puzzler, where you must find the pink Icosasphere to unlock the pink gate to the next level.

** UPDATE **

Sorry for any confusion re: pricing on this game. This is my first time using Itch.io, and there are a lot of options to go through. I certainly don't expect anyone to pay for this game in it's current state (which, is buggy AF).

I also didn't have comments enabled (again, got lost in the submission process), but they're enabled now, so please leave your feedback!

Thanks again!

-N
